Analyzer.Title: Add empty line after embedded statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line after embedded statement.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1030](RCS1030.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line after #region.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty after #region.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line after using directive list.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line after using directive list.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line before closing brace of 'do' statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line before closing brace of 'do' statement.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1092](RCS1092.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line before #endregion.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line before #endregion.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line before using directive list.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line before using directive list.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between accessors.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between accessors.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule does not enforce an empty line between two single-line accessors.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between block and statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between block and statement.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1153](RCS1153.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between declaration and documentation comment.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between declaration and documentation comment.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between declarations.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between declarations.
Analyzer.Remarks:
This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1057](RCS1057.md).
This rule does not enforce an empty line between two single-line declaration.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between single-line accessors.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between single-line accessors.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between single-line declarations.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between single-line declarations.

Sample.Before: object P1 { get; } // [|Id|] object P2 { get; }
Sample.After:
object P1 { get; }
object P2 { get; }

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between single-line declarations of different kind.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between single-line declarations of different kind.

Sample.Before: object P { get; } // [|Id|] object this[int index] { get; }
Sample.After:
object P { get; }
object this[int index] { get; }

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between switch sections.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between switch sections.

Analyzer.Title: Add empty line between using directives with different root namespace.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add empty line between using directives with different root namespace.

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after attribute list.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after attribute list.

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after binary operator instead of before it.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after binary operator instead of before it.

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after conditional operator instead of before it.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after conditional operator instead of before it.

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after expression-body arrow instead of before it.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after expression-body arrow instead of before it.

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after opening brace of accessor.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after opening brace of accessor.

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after opening brace of block.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after opening brace of block.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1185](RCS1185.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after opening brace of empty block.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after opening brace of empty block.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1023](RCS1023.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after opening brace of type declaration.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after opening brace of type declaration.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1076](RCS1076.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline after switch label.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline after switch label.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1028](RCS1028.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before accessor of full property.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before accessor of full property.

Sample.Before: string Foo { get { return _foo; } set { _foo = value; } } // [|Id|]

Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was derived from [RCS1024](RCS1024.md).

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before binary operator instead of after it.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before binary operator instead of after it.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1029](RCS1029.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before conditional operator instead of after it.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before conditional operator instead of after it.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1184](RCS1184.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before constructor initializer.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before constructor initializer.

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before embedded statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before embedded statement.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1027](RCS1027.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before enum member.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before enum member.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1025](RCS1025.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before expression-body arrow instead of after it.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before expression-body arrow instead of after it.

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before statement.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before statement.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1026](RCS1026.md)

Analyzer.Title: Add newline before type parameter constraint.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Add newline before type parameter constraint.

Analyzer.Title: Remove empty line between single-line accessors.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove empty line between single-line accessors.

Analyzer.Title: Remove empty line between single-line declarations of same kind.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove empty line between single-line declarations of same kind.

Sample.After: object P1 { get; } object P2 { get; }

Analyzer.Title: Remove empty line between using directives with different root namespace.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove empty line between using directives with different root namespace.

Analyzer.Title: Remove empty line between using directives with same root namespace.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove empty line between using directives with same root namespace.

Analyzer.Title: Remove newline before base list.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove newline before base list.

Analyzer.Title: Remove newline between closing brace and 'while' keyword.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove newline between closing brace and 'while' keyword.

Analyzer.Title: Remove newline between 'if' keyword and 'else' keyword.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove newline between 'if' keyword and 'else' keyword.

Analyzer.Title: Remove newlines from accessor list of auto-property.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove newlines from accessor list of auto-property.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was derived from [RCS1024](RCS1024.md).

Analyzer.Title: Remove newlines from accessor with single-line expression.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Remove newlines from accessor with single-line expression.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was derived from [RCS1024](RCS1024.md).

Analyzer.Title: Use carriage return + linefeed as newline.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use carriage return + linefeed as newline.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1087](RCS1087.md)

Analyzer.Title: Use linefeed as newline.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use linefeed as newline.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1086](RCS1086.md)

Analyzer.Title: Use spaces instead of tab.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Use spaces instead of tab.
Analyzer.Remarks: This rule was originally introduced as [RCS1088](RCS1088.md)

Analyzer.Title: Wrap and indent each node in list.
Analyzer.MessageFormat: Wrap and indent each node in list.
